answers.answer: I was admitted because of my pulse, my bp was steady. Whats your bp at? And my doc put me on . Bp medication to help regulate my pulse, its its pregnancy induced hypertension they will most likely put you on a bp medication as well. And because of the medication I have growth scans every 3 weeks just to make sure hes growing properly and the medication isent slowing anything down and my baby Boy is perfectly healthy measuring 2.5 weeks ahead. :) Good luck with your tests!
Wiv my second pregnancy i wos in n out ova blood pressure bein high n cudnt keep food down they montored me a few days then sent me home on medication

I was at 155/100 at 930 am yesterday, 178/104 at 4 pm 162/100 at 8pm 153/96 at 12 am 147/96 at 4 am and 135/92 at 8 am 152/93 at 12 theyre checking me again at 4...I am 32 weeks today. They haven't given me any kind of medications the big thing I think theyre waiting on is the urine.
With my 1St I had preeclampsia and the day they found out I got induced 2 hrs later I was 36 weeks. Only way to treat preeclampsia is to have the baby
I certainly hope they don't induce me at 32 weeks, I dont think they will. Theyre still trying to figure which it.is. I really just hope they figure it.out and send me.home soon

question: So my blood pressure is unreasonably high, and has been since yesterday morning. Weirdly enough, I feel fantastic. Theyve done non stress tests on baby, theyre monitoring my bloodpressure every 4 hours, and doing a 24 hour urine sample, which ends at 130. They either think I have hypertensia, brought on by pregnancy, or preeclampsia...i know what both are, but I guess my question is, has anyone else been through this, what solutions did your doctor have, how long were you stuck in the hospital etc.
title: Anyone been admitted.to L&D for blood.pressure?
